posts.post_content:
Here are three much loved cards.
One even has scotch tape applied.
But there is a Kabe Tolstoi, and a Mud Man Lena Blackburne -  so all is not lost.

SOLD... DLVD, PP FF.
Between cardboard, in bubble envelope, with tracking.

Thanks.
